mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(mNum, mId, mPwd, mNick, mRole, createdDate) VALUES (#{mNum}, #{mId}, #{mPwd}, #{mNick}, 1, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO memberDetail(mId, mName, mTel, mZip, mAddr1, mAddr2, mEmail, mBirth) VALUES ( #{mId}, #{mName}, #{mTel}, #{mZip}, #{mAddr1}, #{mAddr2}, #{mEmail}, #{mBirth})
mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO member(mNum, mId, mPwd, mNick) VALUES (#{mNum}, #{mId}, #{mPwd}, #{mNick}) INTO memberDetail(mId, mBirth, mEmail, mtel, mzip, mAddr1, mAddr2) VALUES (#{mId}, #{mBirth}, #{mEmail}, #{mtel}, #{mzip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mAddr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mAddr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT m.mId, mPwd, mNick, mRole, mNum, mName, mTel, mZip, mAddr1, mAddr2, mEmail, TO_CHAR(mBirth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') mBirth FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN memberDetail m2 ON m.mId = m2.mId WHERE m.mId=#{mId}
SELECT mId, mEmail FROM memberDetail WHERE mEmail=#{mEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mPwd=#{mPwd} WHERE mId=#{mId}
UPDATE member SET lastLogin=(SYSDATE) WHERE mId=#{mId}
